title: Hines
description: Designing and developing Internal software used to manage the companies $95.79 billion of dollars in private real-estate assets.

body.raw:
<Image
  src="/projects/hines/cover.png"
  alt="cover"
  width={2267}
  height={1280}
  caption="At Hines I've been responsible for building out full stack applications at scale. And have introduced design systems and fully fledged UI/UX redesigns to some flagship apps."
/>
